text: Hi! I’m Rachel. I’m a designer and have been using HubSpot in different capacities for a few years now. I’m currently working on updating templates using custom modules with repeating elements for our site. Excited to learn more here!
Hi, I'm Molly. I'm working on migrating my company's Wix site to a custom HubSpot CMS template, having developed sites before but this is my first go in HubSpot's design platform. Glad to be here!
Welcome <@UGMGP7A72> - I know we've chatted a bit on the side - but let me officially say we're EXCITED to have you a part of the :sprocket: HubSpot CMS developer community! :clapping::partyparrot:
Awesome - welcome to the :sprocket: Agency Partner family Paul! Do you offer website design services?

Hi <@UGSB7TQTY> - we're super excited to have you in the :sprocket: CMS Developer community! :raised_hands: Great to hear your company has been using HubSpot for some time and REALLY excited to hear ya'll are getting the site on too. Please let the community know if you have any questions or ideas before/during/after the website move. :hamsterdance:
Welcome <@UGRA31G2E> - we're happy to have you a part of our community. Welcome :pug::sharkdance::sprocket::raised_hands:
